row.process: ! requires UC4 script variable &UC4RB_CHECKME# ! different Windows variable are set if the object is a directory, a file or doesn't exist :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_CHECKME#, '"', '""') :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_CHECKME_ESCAPED#, '`', '``') :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_CHECKME_ESCAPED#, '$', '`$') $CHECKME="&UC4RB_CHECKME_ESCAPED#" $ISFILE="0" $ISDIR="0" $EXIST=Test-Path $CHECKME if ($EXIST -eq $True) { $EXIST="1" $ISDIR=Test-Path $CHECKME -pathtype container if ($ISDIR -eq $True) { $ISDIR="1" } else { $ISDIR="0" $ISFILE="1" } } else { $EXIST="0" } :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# is checked for being a dir/file and if it exist" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "ISDIR($ISDIR) ISFILE($ISFILE) EXIST($EXIST)" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "------------------------------" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
